attributes.action: ban all former RBS Directors that served on the Board with Goodwin to be unable to stand as Directors, Chief Executives, Advisers, Consultants, paid staff or volunteers for a ten year period or until they have paid back what the UK Government has paid in bail out money to RBS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would clear out this failed group from operating in any other organisation in whatever capacity

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
